title: 0x00100
author: 0x00100
content: Greetings Bitcointalk community,I would like to introduce an exciting investment opportunity in the gambling industry: ProximaBet. This innovative project is in its investment phase and offers long-term potential for both beginners and experienced investors alike.About ProximaBetProximaBet is a next-generation betting platform that leverages blockchain technology to offer a unique and profitable user experience. At its core, the platform allows users to place bets on the price movement of various cryptocurrency pairs, such as BNB/USD, within a 5-minute window. This creates a user vs. user dynamic where the market determines the winning side.The platform charges a 3% fee from each pool bet and has plans to introduce more pairs and games in the future, providing additional revenue streams.Investment OpportunityProximaBet is offering 7 investment stages, with 5 pre-launch and 2 post-launch. Each stage consists of 1,000 shares for sale, starting at a price of 0.1 BNB per share during the first stage. The share price will increase as the project progresses and milestones are reached.There are a total of 10,000 shares available, with 7,000 allocated for public investors and 3,000 reserved for the team and marketing efforts. Holding these shares will grant users a weekly percentage of the website's profit, with 100 shares equating to a 1% share of the profits.Shares can be purchased on the Binance network through the project's investment platform at invest.proximabet.comSocials: https://linktr.ee/proximabetPlatform sneak peek https://i.imgur.com/cOoQf1C.png
